attributes.action: Make the U.K streets safe again!
attributes.additional_details:
I am sick to death of reading and hearing about people being robbed, stabbed and abused on our streets daily. 

Where are the police? Why have there been so many cuts?  

People sadly no longer feel safe living in the U.K. The gangs are running our streets, not the government!

This needs to stop!
We need our streets back!
We need more control!
We need more police!! 
We need our voices heard!

As U.K residents who pay tax to live here, we should feel safe. 

Action needs to be taken NOW!
attributes.background:
I am a mother of 2 children. One child is 13yrs old & he can no longer go outside to play, to socialise, to learn & to build friendships. Why? Because the risk of him being stabbed or most commonly robbed is so high!! 
The streets are no longer safe and everyone risks being a new target!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about public safety, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/251196

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
